text.textblock: Portion:
Part of said A-5 described as follows: Beginning on the South line of said A-5 at a point which lies N. 86
E., 2500 feet from the Southwest corner of said A-5; Thence, N. 48
W., 3593.07 feet; Thence, N. 03
W., 900 feet, along the West line of said A-5; Thence, Southeasterly approximately 8500 feet along the westerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 86
W., 988.81 feet, along the South line of said A-5, to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning on the South line of said A-5 at a point which lies N. 86
E., 4488.81 feet, from the Southwest corner of A-5; Thence, Northwesterly and Southwesterly approximately, 1500 feet, along the northerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 86
W., 100 feet, along the South line of said A-5; Thence, Northerly, approximately 8500 feet, along the easterly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, N. 03
W., 1350 feet along the west line of said A-5; Thence S. 37
E., 1750 feet; Thence, S. 26
E., 950 feet; Thence, S. 65
E., 2400 feet; Thence, S. 77
E., 1800 feet; Thence, South, 950 feet; Thence, S. 86
W., 600 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning on the South line of said A-5 at a point which lies N. 86
E., 3788.81 feet, from the Southwest corner of A-5; Thence, Northeasterly and Southeasterly, approximately 1250 feet, along the southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 86
W., 600 feet, along the South line of said A-5, to the Point of Beginning.
Survey and Abstract No.:
Portion:
All.
Survey and Abstract No.:
Lawrence & Creecy; A-374.

W., 1500 feet, Thence, N. 88
E., 961.15 feet, along the North line of said A-374, to the Point of Beginning.
